response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value to us, but its worth to you is even greater. We are offering it to you at a special price of $950,000, which we believe strikes a balance between our valuation and your perceived worth of the product. We understand that this is a significant investment, and we are confident that it will provide substantial returns for you. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this exclusive offer.", "product_price": 950000}
